name: Brailliac: Braille Tutor
description: Everything you need to learn Braille!

detailPage1.title: Dictionary
detailPage1.description: Look up symbols quickly and easily, across various Braille codes

detailPage2.title: Practise
detailPage2.description: Pick exactly what to drill, or let the app figure out your weak-points

detailPage3.title: Challenge
detailPage3.description: Compete in translations against the clock

detailPage4.title: Translation
detailPage4.description: Translate real sentences both to and from Braille

detailPage5.title: Level Up
detailPage5.description: Earn points while learning to unlock new features and themes
